title: What are some projects to build when you’re bored? - Quora

response.answer_text: What are some projects to build when you’re bored? Personally, I like writing programs that do artsy stuff. This little Plain English program, for example… To run:Start up.Get some pictures of "famous musicians" from Google.Loop.Scatter the pictures.Draw the pictures.Add 1 to a count. If the count is 60, break.Repeat.Refresh the screen.Wait for the escape key.Destroy the pictures.Shut down. …produces collages like this:
